title: Really Great APP
text: The Outlook app is really really functional and pretty easy to use. Navigating the signature and away messages can be a bit of a challenge unless you are totally familiar with the app. Needs to be a little bit more accessible and easy to use. When you may not be able to get into the office to use the desktop version, being able to navigate that is pretty important. Other than that I really like the app.

title: honest opinion
text: as a gen-z, i have been accustomed to using google for majority of my school career. i never really was educated on using any microsoft platforms such as outlook, but as i am a rising college freshman: being able to use these apps has been significantly easier. i mean it when i say this. its so much easier to access any information at literally the second i receive an email. not only this, but it is so easy to navigate as well! i genuinely mean it when i say this, i wish that school systems would continue to use microsoft apps. it is life changing, seriously.
